explains: adj. 马虎的，草率的；（衣服）宽松的，肥大的；太稀的，不够稠的；庸俗伤感的，过分动情的

sentences.en: He has little patience for sloppy work from colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他无法忍耐同事们马虎的工作。

sentences.en: When your clothes look sloppy, so do you.
sentences.cn: 如果你的衣服看起来邋遢，你也一样。

sentences.en: Embroidery calls for great care. There must not be even a single sloppy stitch.
sentences.cn: 刺绣要求很高，一针也不能马虎。
